The DurakGame class¶

class Game.DurakGame(n_players: int, deckMode: str)¶

Bases: Game.Game

State machine for game of Durak.

Parameters

  • n_players (int) – The number of players playing a game of Durak.

  • deckMode (str) – This is either full’ or `small.

Convert a hand into a deck object.

Input:

hand (np.ndarray): The hand whose first row corresponds to trump suit

getGameEnded()¶

Will return True when game is over.

getHandFromDeck(deck: Cards.Deck) → numpy.ndarray¶

Convert a deck into a “hand”, which is a 2d np.ndarray whose first row is always trump suit.

Input:

deck (Deck): The deck from which we get our hand

The DurakField class¶

class Field.DurakField(deck, players)¶

Bases: Field.Field

This class defines legal moves you can make in a game of Durak, given every players’ hands and the current cards played on the field.

Input:

deck (Deck): A deck that is optionally the deck from which we draw all values.

players (list): A list of Agent.DurakPlayer objects

field¶

The ‘table’ in N x N form, where N is the total number of cards

Type

np.ndarray

in the initial deck. The columns correspond to attacks, and rows correspond to defends, for each attack.
